items.title: ThyssenKrupp loses legal fight against EU antitrust veto of Tata Steel JV
items.description: The Luxembourg-based Court of Justice of the European Union (CJEU), Europe's highest, sided with the European Commission and dismissed Thyssenkrupp's appeal entirely, the judges said.

items.title: SpiceJet says deposited pending PF dues for 10 months after raising funds via QIP
items.description: With plans to introduce new aircraft, expand its routes, and restore its network, SpiceJet is signalling its intent to regain a stronger position in the competitive aviation market.

items.title: Piramal Capital raises $150 million from bond sale
